name: La Piccola Trattoria CDMX
address: Emerson 107, Granada, Polanco V Secc, Miguel Hidalgo, CDMX, Cp 11560

meals.name: 2 Pizzas por $199
meals.description: Elige hasta 2 Pizzas por solo $199

meals.name: 2 Pastas por $219
meals.description: Elige 2 pastas de la selección a un super precios

meals.name: Insalata Della Fabbrica
meals.description: Lechugas, manzana, pera, queso de cabra y reducción de vino tinto.

meals.name: Insalata Nizzarda
meals.description: Lechugas, laminas de atún fresco, jitomate guaje, alcachofa, pimientos, aceitunas al vinagre y huevo cocido.

meals.name: Zuppetta Di Cozze Al Vino Bianco
meals.description: Mejillones, ajo, cherry, perejil, vino blanco y crotones.

meals.name: Insalata Del Mare
meals.description: Variedad de mariscos marinados con limón, aceite de oliva, perejil, sal, pimienta y crotones de pan de ajo.

meals.name: Zuppa Di Funghi
meals.description: Hongos mixtos, ajo, mantequilla, perejil y parmesano.

meals.name: Tonno Al Grill
meals.description: Filete de atún al grill  (250 g) acompañado de verduras en conserva y ensalada.

meals.name: Polipo Al Grill
meals.description: Pulpo al grill (350 g) acompañado de papas al horno y lechugas mixtas.

meals.name: Salmone Al Grill
meals.description: Filete de salmón (250 g) al grill acompañado de pimientos al vinagre y ensalada.

meals.name: Scialatelli Scoglio
meals.description: Mejillones, camarones, almejas, pulpo, calamares, ajo, perejil, jitomate guaje y pomodoro (170 g).

meals.name: Strozzapeti Alla Carbonara
meals.description: Guanciale (pancetta) huevos, parmigiano, sal y pimienta (170 g).

meals.name: Gnocchi Funghi E Gorgonzola
meals.description: Crema de queso gorgonzola y hongos mixtos (170 g).

meals.name: Gnocchi Sorrentina
meals.description: Pomodoro, parmigiano, gratinado al horno con mozzarella fresca (170 g),

meals.name: Gnocchi Ricotta E Ragú
meals.description: Salsa ragú ricotta y parmigiano (170 g).

meals.name: Pappardelle Al Funghi
meals.description: Ajo, hongos mixtos, mantequilla perejil y parmigiano (170 g).

meals.name: Pappardelle Alla Crema Di Tartufo
meals.description: Crema de trufa, aceite de trufa, mantequilla y parmesano (170 g).

meals.name: Pappardelle All´Aragosta
meals.description: Pulpa de langosta, biquet de langosta, cherry, ajo, perjil (170 g) .

meals.name: Pizza Margherita
meals.description: Pomodoro, mozzarella, albahaca y aceite de oliva.

meals.name: Calzone Mamma Mia!!
meals.description: Relleno de salami mozzarella fresca parmegiano al horno.

meals.name: Pizza Sorrento
meals.description:
Pomodoro, mozzarella, jitomate cherry, arugula,prosciutto y
parmesano.

meals.name: Pizza Diavola
meals.description: Pomodoro, mozzarella, salame, peperoncino, parmigiano y aceite picante.

meals.name: Pizza Piccola Trattoria
meals.description: Pomodoro, mozzarella, chorizo, jitomate deshidratado, pimientos.

meals.name: Pizza Oortolana
meals.description: Base blanca, berenjenas, alcachofas, hongos, jitomate deshidratado, friarelli y queso de búfala.

meals.name: Pizza Adriano Celentano
meals.description: Pomodoro, mozzarella, cebolla caramelizada, philadelphia, jitomate deshidratado, prosciutto y oregano.

meals.name: Pizza Alessia
meals.description: Pomodoro, mozzarella, papas, salchicha y oregano.

meals.name: Pizza Piccola Brenda
meals.description: Mozzarella, pulpo, papas y aceitunas negras.

meals.name: Pizza Marianara
meals.description: Pomodoro,laminas de ajo, oregano, albahaca (sin queso).

meals.name: Panini Napoleani
meals.description: Rollos de pan pizza rellenos de jamón, parmesano y mozzarella al  horno.

meals.name: Pizza Bella Napoli
meals.description: Base blanca, almejas, camaron, mejillon, calamar y pulpo.

meals.name: Pizza Tartufo E Porcini
meals.description: Mozzarella fresca, crema de trufa, porcini y grana padano.

meals.name: Pizza Berlusconi
meals.description: Pomodoro, mozzarella, aceituna negra, alcachofa, jamón, champiñón, anchoas, jitomate cherry, albahaca y bufala.

meals.name: Risotto All´Aragosta
meals.description: Pulpa de langosta, biquet de langosta, ajo, perjil.

meals.name: Risotto AI Funghi E Porcini
meals.description: Con mezcla de hongos silvestres, hongo porcini, parmesano y perejil.

meals.name: Risotto Scoglio
meals.description: Con almejas, mejillones, camarón, pulpo, calamares, cherry, ajo y perejil.

meals.name: Risotto Milanese
meals.description: Con azafran y parmesano.

meals.name: Risotto Aaparagi, Bufala E Gorgonzola
meals.description: Con espárrago, queso de bufala y gorgonzola.

meals.name: Salsa Pomodoro
meals.description: Salsa a base de jitomate, cebolla, albahaca y parmigiano.

meals.name: Salsa Arrabbiata
meals.description: Pomodoro, ajo, chile serrano y peperoncino.

meals.name: Salsa Puttanesca
meals.description: Pomodoro, filete de anchoa, alcaparras, aceitunas verdes y negras, ajo y orégano.

meals.name: Salsa Gratinata
meals.description: Salsa de crema acompañada de jamón, champiñones y caciocavallo gratinado en nuestro horno de leña.

meals.name: Lasagna La Piccola Trattoria
meals.description: Laminas de pasta fresca, salsa ragú, polpette, parmigiano, mozzarella, huevo cocido, gratinada al horno.

meals.name: Pesto Genovese
meals.description: Salsa a base de aceite de oliva, albahaca, piñones, nuez y parmigiano.

meals.name: Salsa Ragú
meals.description: Pomodoro, apio, zanahoria, albahaca, carne molida y salsiccia italiana.

meals.name: Salsa 4 Formaggi
meals.description: Salsa a base de crema, queso parmigiano, cabra y gorgonzola.
